title: Not in my Club
body: During the club bug, I was somehow kicked out of the club I created, named ThoseWhoRemain. All of the other members of that club were reinstated, but I am the only one who wasn't. Also, none of them have privileges to invite me back into it. Is there a fix for this?

replies.body:
We can assist you in resolving this if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We deployed fixes for Clubs, but it seems we missed you, so we'll clear this up.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Got exactly the same issue. It might be related to the new client, i'm not sure but I noticed that I was kicked of my club few days ago after installing the new client (might be just a coincidence tho ?)

Please help :'(
